PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1995-13401995-08-160INDUSTRY,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisAmendment to the CANADA BUSINESS CORPORATIONS REGULATIONS which will require that where a share-for-share take over offer is made to shareholders in a company subject to this Act, the take over bidder shall disclose any adverse effect on the rights of those shareholders which may result from differences between this Act and the legislation governing the shares being offered in the take over bid.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1995-0407 Publication Date: 1995-09-06
Attachments
